Report generated: 2025-12-01 03:52:13

======================================================================
Test Case 1 (2D): The 'Decaying Bubble'
======================================================================

Isotropic diffusion with homogeneous Dirichlet BCs.
Exact solution: u = exp(-2*pi^2*t) * sin(pi*x)*sin(pi*y)
Time range: t in [0, 1]

======================================================================
SPATIAL CONVERGENCE STUDY
======================================================================
